title: Exercise TV's Ultimate Body: Lose Weight Fast

Also, add any of the BONUS workouts to diversify your exercise routine!

Quick Calorie Blast Ã¢â‚¬â€œ 20 minutes This cardio workout gives you everything you need to blast away fat - from top to bottom including buns, arms, and legs. Hosted by Michael Carson, this routine will help you lose weight while sculpting both your upper & lower body.

* Quick Trim Torso Ã¢â‚¬â€œ 20 minutes Firm and tone your mid-section with this effective program by host Steve Maresca. YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll look & feel great as you begin to trim away pounds after following this effective workout routine.

Since then, sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s gone on to become a professional dancer performing on stage in Ã¢â‚¬Å“Master Magician Lance BurtonÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ at the Monte Carlo Hotel and Casino, and starring in FitTVÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Ã¢â‚¬Å“All Star Workouts.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ Certified by ACE and AFAA, Stephanie is currently working at Equinox in Los Angeles, and can be seen in the upcoming release of Karen VoightÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Sleek Essentials DVDs.

Steve Maresca
Steve Maresca,a Body By Jake Endorsed Trainer, brings his love of fitness and a dynamic energy filled experience to all his training sessions. For the past 14 years Steve has been teaching group exercise classes as well as designing and implementing personal training programs which combine sound exercise principles and current fitness trends with a cutting edge approach. His experience and training skills allow him to have great success with clients ranging from professional athletes, to weekend warriors, to the physically challenged.
